entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
